WY-55"潑婦"武裝直升機(無武裝)

Key.Original: The WY-55 Hellcat is a multi-purpose military helicopter, most suited for a role of anti-surface battlefield utility, which also has a limited transport capacity. It replaces its predecessor the Super Lynx, improving the maneuverability, durability and protection. The armed version is fitted with twin miniguns and unguided rockets.
Key.Chinese: WY-55"潑婦"是一臺多用途軍用直升機，主要用於反地面作戰，亦可在戰場中做有限的運輸任務。他取代了他的前輩"超山貓"，有著更好的操控性，耐用度與保護。武裝的版本配有兩挺"米尼岡"速射機槍砲與非導引火箭彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: WY-55"泼妇"是一种多用途军用直升机，主要用于反地面作战，亦可在战场中做有限的运输任务。作为"超山猫"的替代型号，它有更好的操控性，航程与装甲。武装型配有两挺转管机枪与非制导火箭弹。

Key.Original: The MBT-52 Kuma is the main battle tank used by Altian Armed Forces. A batch of a few dozen tanks and spare turrets were bought underprice from a south-European country facing an economic collapse. Like similar MBTs of the era, the Kuma is armed with a 120 mm cannon, a 7.62 mm coaxial machinegun and a remotely controlled 12.7 mm HMG. The level of protection for the crew is also remarkable, thanks to additional armor layers.
Key.Chinese: MBT-52"庫瑪"是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的主戰坦克。他們從一個面臨經濟困境的南歐國家手中，以劃算的價格購買了一批坦克與相關備用零件。就像其他同期的主戰坦克，"庫瑪"配備著120公厘加農砲，一挺7.62公厘同軸機槍和一個裝有12.7公厘重機槍的遙控砲塔。它對組員的保護也有相應的提升，這得歸功於它外面的那層裝甲。
Key.Chinesesimp: MBT-52"库玛"是AAF的主战坦克。他们从一个面临经济崩溃的南欧国家手中以划算的价格购买了一批坦克与相关备用零件。就像其他同时代的主战坦克一样，"库玛"装备一门120mm 坦克炮，一挺7.62mm 同轴机枪和一个装有12.7mm 重机枪的遥控武器站。借由附加装甲，它对乘员的保护也有相应的提升。

Key.Original: The FV-720 Mora is an infantry fighting vehicle used by the AAF. They were bought by the AAF from British Armed Forces and reconditioned to serve two more decades. The Mora is armed with a 30 mm cannon and a coaxial machinegun, providing not only a carrying capacity, but also reliable fire support.
Key.Chinese: FV-720"摩拉"是一臺服役於阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的步兵戰車。他們從英軍的手中買下他並著手翻新，打算再用20年。"摩拉"配備著30公厘機砲與同軸機槍，這讓他不只能運輸單位，同時也能提供優秀的火力支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: FV-720"摩拉"是AAF所使用的的步兵战车。AAF从英军的手中买下它们并着手翻新延寿20年。"摩拉"配备着30mm 机炮与同轴机枪，这让它不但能运输单位，同时也能提供优秀的火力支援。

Key.Original: Breaking contact is the means by which an element disengages from a confrontation with an enemy force in an orderly fashion. To execute a “Break Contact via Bounding Overwatch” drill, the following steps are taken:%1%1%3 1.)%4 The element leader announces his intent to break contact via bounding overwatch. He designates one or more elements as the “base of fire”. This element can be as small as a fireteam or may consist of multiple fireteams or squads when employed at the platoon level.%1%3 2.)%4 The base of fire element takes the best hasty position possible and begins laying down fire on the enemy. Oftentimes the base of fire element will be chosen based on already having a good position, making additional movement unnecessary.%1%3 3.)%4 While the base of fire element lays down sustained accurate fire on the enemy, other elements move via rushes to the rear. These elements pick spots of natural or artificial cover or concealment from which they can support the base of fire element when it pulls back. Smoke is deployed to conceal movement when available.%1%3 4.)%4 On the element leader’s command, or at their discretion, the base of fire displaces to the rear towards the supporting elements. These supporting elements begin sustained accurate firing on the enemy until the base of fire element has moved past them and established a new position.%1%3 5.)%4 This process is repeated as necessary until friendly forces have successfully disengaged from enemy contact.
Key.Chinese: 脫離交戰是指要如何有順序的與敵人的部隊停止交戰。要執行"使用掩護躍進來脫離交戰"，請遵照以下步驟:%1%1%3 1.)%4小隊長必須宣布他將要執行掩護躍進來脫離交戰。他必須指定幾個單位來當作"基礎火力"。當基礎火力的單位可以小至一個火力伍，大至複數個火力伍或小隊，端看你手上的兵力有多少。%1%3 2.)%4當基礎火力的單位必須立刻找到一個最佳的位置，並開始向敵人進行火力壓制。大多數的時候，我們必須選擇已經有良好位置的單位來當作基礎火力，免得一些不必要的移動產生。%1%3 3.)%4當基礎火力的單位開始向敵人進行精準火力壓制時，其他單位必須迅速的向後方移動。這些單位必須再找到其他的天然或人工掩體，亦或是一些隱藏的點，這些點必須是可以支援基礎火力向後撤的時候，可以向敵人射擊的點。如果可以在有煙霧的掩護下移動更好。%1%3 4.)%4基礎火力的單位隊長必須下令，或是他們自行斟酌，開始移動到支援單位的後面。而這些支援單位必須開始向敵人進行精準火力壓制，直到基礎火力單位通過他們身後並找到找到新的開火點。%1%3 5.)%4這過程必須不斷的重複，直到確認友軍部隊脫離與敵人的交戰為止。
Key.Chinesesimp: 脱离交战是指要如何有顺序的与敌人的部队停止交战。要执行"使用掩护跃进来脱离交战"，请遵照以下步骤:%1%1%3 1.)%4小队长必须宣布他将要执行掩护跃进来脱离交战。他必须指定几个单位来当作"基础火力"。当基础火力的单位可以小至一个火力伍，大至复数个火力伍或小队，看你手上的兵力有多少。%1%3 2.)%4当基础火力的单位必须立刻找到一个最佳的位置，并开始向敌人进行火力压制。大多数的时候，我们必须选择已经有良好位置的单位来当作基础火力，免得一些不必要的移动产生。%1%3 3.)%4当基础火力的单位开始向敌人进行精准火力压制时，其他单位必须迅速的向后方移动。这些单位必须再找到其他的天然或人工掩体，亦或是一些隐藏的点，这些点必须是可以支援基础火力向后撤的时候，可以向敌人射击的点。如果可以在有烟雾的掩护下移动更好。%1%3 4.)%4基础火力的单位队长必须下令，或是他们自行斟酌，开始移动到支援单位的后面。而这些支援单位必须开始向敌人进行精准火力压制，直到基础火力单位通过他们身后并找到找到新的开火点。%1%3 5.)%4这过程必须不断的重复，直到确认友军部队脱离与敌人的交战为止。

Key.Original: Arma 3 refines stamina into a more significant gameplay factor than in prior games. Dealing with fatigue is best done in a number of different ways. Here are some of them.%1%1%2%3Monitor your encumbrance.%4 You can see your current encumbrance level in the inventory screen, at the bottom of the window. Try to keep this such that there’s a comfortable gap between your current load and the maximum load.%1%1%2%3Take reasonable combat loads.%4 A basic fighting load should include around ten magazines, a rifle, first-aid kit, and some fragmentation grenades. This leaves you room to pack a bit extra as well without becoming unnecessarily overburdened.%1%2%3Sprinting everywhere is not the answer.%4 It is easy to fatigue yourself unnecessarily by trying to sustain a high pace of movement for too great a period of time. Move around at a jog or a walk, and reserve your energy for times when you will badly need it.%1%2%3Rest briefly at tactically appropriate times.%4 Take a moment to rest between significant moves, during long sustained tactical movements, or before moving across a danger area. Resting also gives you an opportunity to increase your situational awareness.%1%2%3Crew-served teams often carry heavier gear.%4 Heavy anti-tank team gunners, anti-air gunners, medium or heavy machinegun teams, and others fall into this category. When acting as one of these roles, you will need to pace yourself. Recognize that carrying hundreds of pounds of gear will slow you down.
Key.Chinese: 武裝突襲3在遊戲中加入了耐力的設定，來突顯他與其他遊戲的不同。要處理疲勞。你可以遵照以下方法來解決。%1%1%2%3監控你的負荷量。%4你可以在裝備欄的底下看到你的負荷量。盡量保持你的當前負荷量與最大負荷量間的距離，不建議你把負荷量撐到滿。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\inventory_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3選擇合理且必要的裝備。%4基本的裝備建議要有十個左右的彈匣，一把步槍，急救箱，以及一些破片手榴彈。這樣的配置，能讓你有一些額外的空間來裝載其他的東西。%1%2%3到處衝刺是不明智的。%4長期衝刺是很容易疲累的。移動時請使用慢跑或走路，把體力留到你真的非常需要它的時候。%1%2%3在適當的時間中休息。%4在要特別移動前，請先短暫休息一下，尤其當你要長期進行衝刺或是通過危險的區域時。休息同時也提供一個機會，好讓你能整理當前狀況。%1%2%3重武器小隊通常會攜帶更沉重的裝備。%4重型反坦克小隊的槍手，防空小隊的槍手，中型或重機槍小隊，這幾類人都屬於同一類型。當你扮演這幾個角色時，請自行調整休息的節奏。你必須體認到數百磅的重量會減低你的行進速度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装突袭3在游戏中加入了耐力的设定，来突显它与其它游戏的不同。要处理疲劳。你可以遵照以下方法来解决。%1%1%2%3监控你的负荷量。%4你可以在装备栏的底下看到你的负荷量。尽量保持你的当前负荷量与最大负荷量间的距离，不建议你把负荷量负载到不堪重负。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\inventory_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3选择合理且必要的装备。%4基本的装备建议要有十个左右的弹匣，一把步枪，急救箱，以及一些破片手榴弹。这样的配置，能让你有一些额外的空间来装载其他的东西。%1%2%3到处冲刺是不明智的。%4长期冲刺是很容易疲累的。移动时请使用慢跑或走路，把体力留到你真的非常需要它的时候。%1%2%3在适当的时间中休息。%4在要特别移动前，请先短暂休息一下，尤其当你要长期进行冲刺或是通过危险的区域时。休息同时也提供一个机会，好让你能整理当前状况。%1%2%3重武器小队通常会携带更沉重的装备。%4重型反坦克小队的枪手，防空小队的枪手，中型或重机枪小队，这几类人都属于同一类型。当你扮演这几个角色时，请自行调整休息的节奏。你必须体认到数百磅的重量会减低你的行进速度。

Key.Original: The goal of recon is to gather information about the enemy through the proper and skilled application of stealth and observation. Recon assets attempt to find out things like:%1%1%2%3Where the enemy is%4, along with what weapons they have, vehicle assets, their state of awareness, whether they have patrols in the area, etc.%1%2%3Where the enemy’s defenses are%4, what they consist of, where the weakest points are.%1%2%3What the terrain is like around the enemy location%4, with regards to the friendly mission. If the intent is to attack the enemy, this means locating good support-by-fire (SBF) positions, assault lanes, etc.%1%1%1Good reconnaissance is the most reliable and effective way of finding the enemy. It's critical not only when attacking, but also while defending and in general “movement to contact” situations. The more you know about the enemy before the firefight starts, the more likely you will be able to maneuver and plan to fight in a way that will maximize your strengths and minimize their ability to resist.
Key.Chinese: 偵察的目標就是要使用隱蔽與觀察來收集敵人的情報，要達到此目的，你必須熟練且正確的的使用以下技巧。偵察要找出的情報包括以下幾種:%1%1%2%3敵人在哪裡%4，他們擁有什麼武器，載具資源，隸屬哪個國家，在該區域內有沒有巡邏等等。%1%2%3敵人在哪防禦%4，他們的組成如何，最弱的防守點在哪。%1%2%3敵人週遭的地形環境長什麼樣%4，是否有友軍單位在任務區域內活動。假如你的目的是要攻擊敵人，那最好設置支援火力的位置在哪，敵人的行進路線在哪等等，皆是偵察需得到的情報。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\recon_ca.paa'/>%1%1偵察是找到敵人的最佳辦法。它不只對攻擊行動有幫助，它亦能夠幫助防守或"無掩體接敵"等任務行動。你在交戰前越能了解敵人，你越能有充分的時間去規劃及執行對應的計畫，最大限度的提升你隊伍的長處，並弱化敵人的抵抗能力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察的目标就是要使用隐蔽与观察来收集敌人的情报，要达到此目的，你必须熟练且正确的的使用以下技巧。侦察要找出的情报包括以下几种:%1%1%2%3敌人在哪里%4，他们拥有什么武器，载具资源，隶属哪个国家，在该区域内有没有巡逻等等。%1%2%3敌人在哪防御%4，他们的组成如何，最弱的防守点在哪。%1%2%3敌人周遭的地形环境长什么样%4，是否有友军单位在任务区域内活动。假如你的目的是要攻击敌人，那最好设置支援火力的位置在哪，敌人的行进路线在哪等等，都是侦察需要得到的情报。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\recon_ca.paa'/>%1%1侦察是找到敌人的最佳办法。它不只对攻击行动有帮助，它亦能够帮助防守或"无掩体接敌"等任务行动。你在交战前越能了解敌人，你越能有充分的时间去规划及执行对应的计划，最大限度的提升你队伍的长处，并弱化敌人的抵抗能力。

Key.Original: Use IR grenades for signaling or marking targets during night-time.%1%2Throw an IR grenade by pressing %11.%1%2Cycle between grenade and chemlight types by pressing %12.%1The angle of the throw has a great influence on its distance.
Key.Chinese: 紅外線手榴彈被用於夜間行動，其用途可當作信號或是標記目標用。%1%2使用%11來投擲紅外線手榴彈。%1%2使用%12來循環切換手榴彈與螢光棒等投擲武器。%1扔的角度對距離會有很大的影響。
Key.Chinesesimp: 红外手榴弹被用于夜间行动，其用途可当作信号或是标记目标用。%1%2使用%11来投掷红外线手榴弹。%1%2使用%12来循环切换手榴弹与萤光棒等投掷武器。%1扔的角度对距离会有很大的影响。

Key.Original: IR Grenades are especially useful for marking targets, because they can be targeted by vehicle operators.%1%2When in a vehicle, press %13 to target.%1%2Cycle available targets by %14.
Key.Chinese: 紅外線手榴彈在標記目標上是很有效的，因為載具的操作員可以直接鎖定它們。%1%2當你在載具裡時，按下%13來鎖定它。%1%2使用%14來循環切換可鎖定的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 红外手榴弹在标记目标上是很有效的，因为载具的操作员可以直接锁定它们。%1%2当你在载具里时，按下%13来锁定它。%1%2使用%14来循环切换可锁定的目标。

Key.Original: The map and the compass are two basic tools for orientation and you should know how to use them.%1%1%2%3Reading the map.%4 The main thing to remember is that the grids must be read right, and then up. Due to the fact that the map grid is composed entirely of numbers, it’s important that you do not transpose them. Note that depending on the map zoom, you may see two, three, or even four numbers per horizontal or vertical grid. This reflects the precision of the coordinate. For example, a six-digit grid (3+3) defines a square that is 100 meters on a side. A four-digit grid (2+2) defines a square that is one kilometer on a side. An eight-digit grid is 10 meters on a side, while a ten digit grid is 1 meter on a side.%1 %1(Read right, and then up) %1%1%2%3Points of elevation.%4 The numbers scattered around the map indicate points of elevation. These occur either at the top of a protrusion (such as a hill) or the bottom of a depression (such as a valley). When communicating map locations over voice chat, numbered hills can be referred to as “Hill 123”.%1%2%3How to read the compass.%4 The compass is graduated three ways. The first and simplest is via the cardinal North, South, East, and West directions. After that it is graduated in degrees - 0 to 359. This is the inner, larger set of numbers, and should be used when calling out specific target bearings. The final outer set of measurements are known as “Mils”, and generally do not have a use aside from communicating with artillery units.%1
Key.Chinese: 地圖與指北針是最基礎的兩樣裝備，你必須學會如何使用它們。%1%1%2%3閱讀地圖。%4第一個最重要的事情，就是座標必須先念橫向座標，再念直向座標。由於地圖完全被網格座標給區分開來，所以不念錯座標就是你應當做到的基本功夫，否則將會跟友軍有溝通上的困難。請注意，由於地圖會縮放，所以你有可能會在橫向與直向座標看到二到四位數字，端看你當前的的放大率是多少而決定。而數字的多寡也反映了座標的精度。舉個例子，一個每邊是100公尺所構成的正方形，它是由六位座標數字(3+3)來標記。四位座標數字(2+2)所標記的方格，則是每邊有1公里長的正方形。而八位座標數字(4+4)所標記方格的邊長是10公尺，十位座標數字(5+5)則是1公尺。%1<imgsize='9'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\map_ca.paa'/>%1<t%10>(先念橫向，再念直向)</t>%1%1%2%3座標的海拔高度。%4散落在地圖各處的數字，其標記的是各點的海拔高度。這些數字大多會寫在明顯的高地(像是山丘)或者低窪處(像是山谷)。當你使用語音通訊的時候，你可以直接使用高地的標高來當作其代號，像是"123高地"。%1%2%3如何閱讀指北針。%4閱讀指北針有三種方式。第一種同時也是最簡單的方式，就是直接看出北方(箭頭)，東方，西方，南方的位置。再來第二種方式，則是讀出內圈比較大的那組數字，數字範圍從0-359度，這適合在指定特定目標時使用。而最後一種方法，則是閱讀外圈那組小數字，這數字常被大家稱作"密位"，在通常的狀況之下，除了與砲兵通聯外，是不需要用到這組數字的。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\compass_ca.paa'/>
Key.Chinesesimp: 地图与指北针是最基础的两样装备，你必须学会如何使用它们。%1%1%2%3阅读地图。%4第一个最重要的事情，就是座标必须先念横向座标，再念纵向座标。由于地图完全被网格座标给区分开来，所以不念错座标就是你应当做到的基本功，否则将会跟友军有沟通上的困难。请注意，由于地图会缩放，所以你有可能会在横向与纵向座标看到二到四位数字，看你当前的的放大率是多少而决定。而数字的多寡也反映了座标的精度。举个例子，一个每边是100米所构成的正方形，它是由六位座标数字(3+3)来标记。四位座标数字(2+2)所标记的方格，则是每边有1千米长的正方形。而八位座标数字(4+4)所标记方格的边长是10米，十位座标数字(5+5)则是1米。%1<imgsize='9'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\map_ca.paa'/>%1<t%10>(先念横向，再念直向)</t>%1%1%2%3座标的海拔高度。%4散落在地图各处的数字，其标记的是各点的海拔高度。这些数字大多会写在明显的高地(像是山丘)或者低洼处(像是山谷)。当你使用语音通信的时候，你可以直接使用高地的标高来当作其代号，像是"123高地"。%1%2%3如何阅读指北针。%4阅读指北针有三种方式。第一种同时也是最简单的方式，就是直接看出北方(箭头)，东方，西方，南方的位置。再来第二种方式，则是读出内圈比较大的那组数字，数字范围从0-359度，这适合在指定特定目标时使用。而最后一种方法，则是阅读外圈那组小数字，这数字常被大家称作"密位"，在通常的状况之下，除了与炮兵通联外，是不需要用到这组数字的。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\compass_ca.paa'/>

Key.Original: If your element comes under fire, follow these basic guidelines, depending on what level of leadership you’re at.%1%1%3Fireteam Member%4%1%2%3Take up as good of a position as possible.%4 Prioritize cover, only go for concealment if no cover is available and scan for signs of the enemy as you return fire in the direction of the enemy.%1%1%2%3Listen for orders from the fireteam leader.%4 If your element leader is killed, and you are next in command, take command and evaluate the situation as a fireteam leader would.%1%2%3Don’t be afraid to show disciplined initiative.%4 Fireteam members are at the forefront of the battle. If you see an opportunity or a danger, take the initiative to do or say something about it. This includes seeing or hearing evidence of enemy armor coming.%1%2%3Deal with wounds.%4 If wounded, announce it and make your way to the squad medic if the wound is dire. If it’s a light wound, continue fighting until things calm down.%1
Key.Chinese: 假如你的單位遭遇襲擊，請遵照以下準則行動，準則將會因你的角色不同而有所改變。%1%1%3小隊隊員%4%1%2%3盡量尋找良好的地點。%4優先尋找掩護，假如沒有可靠的掩護，尋找隱蔽點也是一個辦法，再來就是尋找敵人的跡象，並向敵人的方向開火反擊%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover3_ca.paa'/>。%1%2%3聽從小隊長的指揮。%4假如你的小隊長已經陣亡，而你又是下一個負責接替指揮的隊員的話，請立即接替指揮，並評估當前狀況。%1%2%3不要害怕表達或行動。%4小隊隊員常身處前線。假如你看到了一個機會或是危險，請立即採取行動或是回報。像是看到或聽到敵人的裝甲部隊正在向你們靠近。%1%2%3處理傷口。%4假如你受傷了，先向大家通報，而如果傷勢嚴重的話，你必須想辦法前往醫護兵那邊。假如只是輕傷，請繼續戰鬥，直到所有事情都平靜下來為止。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\wound_ca.paa'/>
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你的单位遭遇袭击，请遵照以下准则行动，准则将会因你的角色不同而有所改变。%1%1%3小队队员%4%1%2%3尽量寻找良好的地点。%4优先寻找掩护，假如没有可靠的掩护，寻找隐蔽点也是一个办法，再来就是寻找敌人的迹象，并向敌人的方向开火反击%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover3_ca.paa'/>。%1%2%3听从小队长的指挥。%4假如你的小队长已经阵亡，而你又是下一个负责接替指挥的队员的话，请立即接替指挥，并评估当前状况。%1%2%3不要害怕表达或行动。%4小队队员常身处前线。假如你看到了一个机会或是危险，请立即采取行动或是回报。像是看到或听到敌人的装甲部队正在向你们靠近。%1%2%3处理伤口。%4假如你受伤了，先向大家通报，而如果伤势严重的话，你必须想办法前往医护兵那边。假如只是轻伤，请继续战斗，直到所有事情都平静下来为止。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\wound_ca.paa'/>

Key.Original: In this section we’ll provide some useful tips for engaging in night-time operations.%1%1%2%3Flashlights.%4 Flashlights are best used in short ‘bursts’ - you toggle them on to illuminate something or scan an area, then turn them off once you’ve seen what you need to see. After turning them off, make sure to move away from that position.%1%1%2%3Nightvision.%4 Nightvision works via the amplification of ambient light - be it from stars, the moon, or artificial sources. Thus, it works best when the moon is out or the sky is clear - clouds and such tend to degrade the image quality. Nightvision also opens up the use of infrared gear like infrared (IR) lasers. %1%1%2%3IR lasers.%4 Employment of IR lasers is very similar to that of flashlights, in that you don’t want to leave them turned on all the time. Keeping lasers turned off helps to ‘declutter’ what soldiers are seeing. Good laser discipline happens when using lasers only to indicate targets, direct attention, or are actively employing weapons.%1%1%2%3Weapon usage at night.%4 Beware of muzzle flash. If there’s no solid cover nearby, change positions after each burst - the enemy will return fire where they last saw the muzzle flashes. If non-tracer magazines are available, try to use them whenever possible. Save tracer magazines for critical situations like designating targets or when your side has fire superiority.
Key.Chinese: 在本單元中，我們將會教你一些在夜間作戰時可用的技巧。%1%1%2%3手電筒。%4手電筒的使用方式最好是短暫開啟最好，當你開啟它後，請迅速向你想看的目標或區域照射並掃視一次，然後得到你想要的情報之後，在迅速將他關上。請切記，最好在使用完手電筒之後，離開原本使用手電筒的位置，以避免暴露你的行蹤。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\lights_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3夜視鏡。%4夜視鏡的作用原理來自於放大週遭的環境光-像是星星，月亮，或是路燈等光源。不過還是推薦在有月亮高掛的夜晚，它的效果才是最好的，如果有雲擋住，將會降低影像的品質。夜視鏡還可見到平時肉眼所見不到的紅外線，所以可以使用它來觀察紅外線雷射的光束。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\nvg_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3紅外線雷射。%4紅外線雷射的作用方式跟手電筒很像，同樣的，你不會想一直讓它保持開啟。保持雷射關閉有助於士兵的視野清晰。雷射最好在指示目標，標明方向，標記正在活動的武器等目標時，才會被開啟。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\lasers_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3在夜間使用武器。%4請小心你的槍口焰。假如你附近沒有堅硬的掩體，請在每次射擊之後變換位置-因為敵人會向最後看到槍口焰的位置開火。假如你身上有攜帶不是曳光彈的彈匣的話，請盡量使用它們。保留你的曳光彈彈匣，除非你身處危及的狀況並需要標記敵人的方位時，要不就是你的兵力優勢遠大於對方時。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在本单元中，我们将会教你一些在夜间作战时可用的技巧。%1%1%2%3手电筒。%4手电筒的使用方式最好是短暂开启最好，当你开启它后，请迅速向你想看的目标或区域照射并扫视一次，然后得到你想要的情报之后，在迅速将它关上。请切记，最好在使用完手电筒之后，离开原本使用手电筒的位置，以避免暴露你的行踪。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\lights_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3夜视仪。%4夜视仪的作用原理来自于放大周遭的环境光-像是星星，月亮，或是路灯等光源。不过还是推荐在有月亮高挂的夜晚，它的效果才是最好的，如果有云挡住，将会降低影像的品质。夜视仪还可见到平时肉眼所见不到的红外线，所以可以使用它来观察红外线雷射的光束。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\nvg_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3红外线雷射。%4红外线雷射的作用方式跟手电筒很像，同样的，你不会想一直让它保持开启。保持雷射关闭有助于士兵的视野清晰。雷射最好在指示目标，标明方向，标记正在活动的武器等目标时，才会被开启。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\lasers_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3在夜间使用武器。%4请小心你的枪口焰。假如你附近没有坚硬的掩体，请在每次射击之后变换位置-因为敌人会向最后看到枪口焰的位置开火。假如你身上有携带不是曳光弹的弹匣的话，请尽量使用它们。保留你的曳光弹弹匣，除非你身处危及的状况并需要标记敌人的方位时，要不就是你的兵力优势远大于对方时。

Key.Original: Proper movement will keep you alive, whereas sloppy movement tends to result in a lot of unnecessary pain and suffering once the enemy has a chance to contest it. The following guidelines should serve you well if you heed them.%1%1%2%3Move from cover to cover, or concealment to concealment.%4 If you’re under fire, do so in short rushes. Ensure that you know where you’re going next before you start to move from your current position.%1%2%3Maintain good intervals.%4 Bunching up gets people killed. Try to keep at least five meters between yourself and any other team members whenever possible. Ten meters is even better.%1%2%3Take a knee at halts.%4 Kneeling or crouching lowers your exposure, which makes it harder for someone to hit you. Get into the habit of taking a knee any time that you’re halted for more than a second or two. If you expect to be stationary for a longer period of time, go prone, find better cover or concealment, or both.%1%1%2%3I’m up, they see me, I’m down.%4 The basic “individual rush” consists of jumping up, sprinting forward a bit, and then diving prone. Throwing in a roll after hitting the deck will help to throw off the enemy’s aim. The “diving prone” at the end of each rush can also help to confuse the enemy.%1%2%3Don’t skyline yourself.%4 Skylining is silhouetting yourself against the sky. If you absolutely must cross a ridge and think the enemy might be looking that way, go prone and try to cross the ridge where vegetation provides some amount of concealment.%1
Key.Chinese: 學會如何正確的移動能保住你的小命，而草率且未經思考的移動，往往就提供了敵人痛擊你的機會。遵照以下準則能幫助你學會正確的移動。%1%1%2%3在掩體之間移動，或者在隱蔽點之間移動。%4假如你正遭受攻擊，請立即這樣做。你必須在每次移動前就確定好下一個位置的地點。%1%2%3保持間隔。%4聚在一團總會讓大家死的特別快。盡可能與你的隊友保持5公尺的間隔。10公尺的話更好。%1%2%3停滯時請蹲下。%4蹲下或趴下將降低你中彈的風險，這會讓你的敵人比較難射中你。請養成只要停下來超過1秒鐘以上就蹲下的習慣。假如你預期會停滯比較長的時間，請尋找掩體或隱蔽點，要不就趴下。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\knee_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3我站起來，他們看見我，我再立刻趴下。%4基本的"單體衝刺"動作包括了突然站起來，向前衝刺一小段，然後再立即趴下。這種移動方式能讓敵人不好瞄準你。而在每次動作最後的"立即趴下"這個動作，有助於迷惑敵人。%1%2%3不要站在天際線上。%4當你在處在天際線上的時候，你的剪影會很明顯的顯現出來。假如你一定得通過一處山脊，而你又假設敵人正在觀察那個山脊，那你就必須使用趴下來越過這個山脊，如果附近有能隱蔽你身影的植被的話那就更好了。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\skyline_ca.paa'/>
Key.Chinesesimp: 学会如何正确的移动能保住你的小命，而草率且未经思考的移动，往往就提供了敌人痛击你的机会。遵照以下准则能帮助你学会正确的移动。%1%1%2%3在掩体之间移动，或者在隐蔽点之间移动。%4假如你正遭受攻击，请立即这样做。你必须在每次移动前就确定好下一个位置的地点。%1%2%3保持间隔。%4聚在一团总会让大家死的特别快。尽可能与你的队友保持5米的间隔。10米的话更好。%1%2%3停滞时请蹲下。%4蹲下或趴下将降低你中弹的风险，这会让你的敌人比较难射中你。请养成只要停下来超过1秒钟以上就蹲下的习惯。假如你预期会停滞比较长的时间，请寻找掩体或隐蔽点，要不就趴下。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\knee_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3我站起来，他们看见我，我再立刻趴下。%4基本的"单体冲刺"动作包括了突然站起来，向前冲刺一小段，然后再立即趴下。这种移动方式能让敌人不好瞄准你。而在每次动作最后的"立即趴下"这个动作，有助于迷惑敌人。%1%2%3不要站在天际线上。%4当你在处在天际线上的时候，你的剪影会很明显的显现出来。假如你一定得通过一处山脊，而你又假设敌人正在观察那个山脊，那你就必须使用趴下来越过这个山脊，如果附近有能隐蔽你身影的植被的话那就更好了。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\skyline_ca.paa'/>

Key.Original: Several things influence the accuracy of your fire in Arma 3. The more elements you have in your favor, the better your accuracy will be. The specific factors are as follows:%1%1%2%3Stance. %4You will be more accurate the more stable your stance is. You are most accurate when prone, less accurate when crouched, and least accurate when standing. In some unusual stances you may not be able to get a proper sight picture, reducing your capability for aimed fire.%1%1%2%3Stamina.%4 If you’re exhausted from sprinting all over the place or carrying heavy loads, your sights will drift and jostle around until you’ve recovered, making accuracy difficult.%1%2%3Breath control.%4 If you use breath control properly, you’ll be able to shoot more accurately than someone who doesn’t. Ensure that you have this feature bound to a readily accessible key, as it will come in handy more than a few times during every mission. Holding your breath for too long will cause your stability to degrade, so make sure you only use this when you’re about to take your shot.%1%2%3Wounds.%4 If you’ve taken damage, particularly to your arms, your ability to hold a rifle stable will be compromised. The only thing you can do to correct this is to find a medic and be healed. %1
Key.Chinese: 在武裝突襲3中有幾件事情會影響到你的精準度。掌握這些影響因素，將能大大的提高你的命中率。具體的因素如下:%1%1%2%3姿態。%4在更穩定的姿態中，你將獲得更好的精準度。精準度由高到低依序是趴下，蹲下以及站立。在某些特定的姿態中，你將不能獲得良好的瞄準畫面，這將影響你的射擊能力。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\stances_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3耐力。%4假如你才剛剛衝刺完或是你背的裝備很沉重，都會使你在瞄準時呼吸不順，以至於準心亂飄。當體力恢復之後，準心才會穩定下來。%1%2%3控制呼吸。%4假如你能良好的控制呼吸，你的精準度將會比別人還高。請確保該功能已經設定到鍵盤上你好按的位置。憋氣時間過長將會使你的準心穩定度暫時下降，所以請確保只有你要開火的時候才進行憋氣。%1%2%3受傷。%4假如你受傷了，尤其是手臂的傷害，將會嚴重影響到你拿槍的能力。而這時你唯一能做的事情就是去找醫護兵報到。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\wound2_ca.paa'/>
Key.Chinesesimp: 在武装突袭3中有几件事情会影响到你的精准度。掌握这些影响因素，将能大大的提高你的命中率。具体的因素如下:%1%1%2%3姿态。%4在更稳定的姿态中，你将获得更好的精准度。精准度由高到低依序是趴下，蹲下以及站立。在某些特定的姿态中，你将不能获得良好的瞄准画面，这将影响你的射击能力。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\stances_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3耐力。%4假如你才刚刚冲刺完或是你背的装备很沉重，都会使你在瞄准时呼吸不顺，以至于准心乱飘。当体力恢复之后，准心才会稳定下来。%1%2%3控制呼吸。%4假如你能良好的控制呼吸，你的精准度将会比别人还高。请确保该功能已经设定到键盘上你好按的位置。憋气时间过长将会使你的准心稳定度暂时下降，所以请确保只有你要开火的时候才进行憋气。%1%2%3受伤。%4假如你受伤了，尤其是手臂的伤害，将会严重影响到你拿枪的能力。而这时你唯一能做的事情就是去找医护兵报到。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\wound2_ca.paa'/>

Key.Original: Once contact has been made and fire is being exchanged, start paying attention to these aspects:%1%1%2%3Muzzle flashes and muzzle smoke.%4 You may not always see the outline of an enemy, but a big puff of smoke and dust in the day or flash of flame at night (and other low light situations) - which keeps popping up from the same location - can act as a great enemy indicator.%1%1%2%3Tracers.%4 Tracers are brilliant neon signs that say “I’m firing from over here!” These are the most visible signs of the enemy, and the easiest to follow back to the shooter’s origin. Note that not all weapons will fire tracers, and some weapons will even use special “dim tracers” that can only be seen with nightvision devices.%1%1%2%3Smoke.%4 If the enemy fires a heavy weapon such as a rocket-propelled grenade (RPG), you’ll be able to pick out their position by the large volume of smoke produced by the weapon’s backblast. You may also see the enemy using smokescreens to mask their movement. However, keep in mind that the enemy will sometimes employ smoke as a diversion.%1%1%2%3Dead enemies.%4 This is particularly useful if contact was made with the enemy by another element, Close Air Support, or artillery. Dead enemy soldiers can give you an idea of where the enemy was, what they were (e.g. special forces, normal troops, etc.) and even where they may still be.
Key.Chinese: 一旦雙方已經開始交戰，請隨時注意以下幾件事情:%1%1%2%3槍口焰與槍口煙。%4你可能不是每次都能看清楚敵人在哪裡，但是在早晨的槍口煙或是晚上的槍口焰(或者其他比較暗的情況)-這些都將顯示出敵人大概的位置，可以讓你來回擊敵人。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\muzzle_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3曳光彈。%4曳光彈是個最清楚不過的記號，就好似敵人正向你說"我在這裡開火!"一樣，通過曳光彈，我們能很容易追蹤到射手的位置。請注意，並不是所有的武器都能發射曳光彈，而有些武器甚至是使用"幽黯型曳光彈"，這種曳光彈只能使用夜視鏡來進行觀察。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\tracers_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3煙霧。%4假如敵人發射像是火箭推進榴彈(RPG)這種的重型武器，你將可輕易的觀察到發射時所產生的大量煙霧。你也可能會看到敵人使用煙霧彈來隱蔽他們的行蹤。然而請注意一點，敵人同樣也可能使用煙霧來達到聲東擊西的效果。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\smoke_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3死掉的敵人。%4這些屍體可能是因為其他因素而產生，像是友軍的密接空中支援或是火炮打擊。死掉的敵人能讓你知道敵人之前的位置在哪，所屬單位(像是特種部隊，普通部隊等等。)，甚至敵人還在那個位置也說不定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦双方已经开始交战，请随时注意以下几件事情:%1%1%2%3枪口火焰与枪口烟。%4你可能不是每次都能看清楚敌人在哪里，但是在早晨的枪口烟或是晚上的枪口火焰(或者其他比较暗的情况)-这些都将显示出敌人大概的位置，可以让你有效回击敌人。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\muzzle_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3曳光弹。%4曳光弹是个最清楚不过的记号，就好似敌人正向你说"我在这里开火!"一样，通过曳光弹，我们能很容易追踪到射手的位置。请注意，并不是所有的武器都能发射曳光弹，而有些武器甚至是使用"幽黯型曳光弹"，这种曳光弹只能使用夜视仪来进行观察。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\tracers_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3烟雾。%4假如敌人发射像是火箭推进榴弹(RPG)这种的重型武器，你将可轻易的观察到发射时所产生的大量烟雾。你也可能会看到敌人使用烟雾弹来隐蔽他们的行踪。然而请注意一点，敌人同样也可能使用烟雾来达到声东击西的效果。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\smoke_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3死掉的敌人。%4这些尸体可能是因为其他因素而产生，像是友军的密接空中支援或是火炮打击。死掉的敌人能让你知道敌人之前的位置在哪，所属单位(像是特种部队，普通部队等等。)，甚至敌人还在那个位置也说不定。

Key.Original: Being able to visually differentiate between friends and foes is a critical skill to possess. Someone who cannot tell the difference between their faction’s uniforms and gear, and those of the enemy, is a danger to their entire team. There are several basic guidelines that can be followed to help prevent friendly fire incidents.%1%1%2%3Keep your finger off the trigger.%4 Keeping your “firing”‘ finger rested on your middle mouse button, instead of the fire button, helps to prevent an accidental and potentially fatal shot at the worst possible time.%1%1%2%3Think before you pull the trigger.%4 Establish positive identification before firing. If it doesn’t feel right, if something seems “off” or amiss, hold fire. If it looks like a friend, has a friendly weapon, isn’t shooting at you, but seems like it’s in an enemy area, it may be a friend, and you can’t risk taking a shot without being sure.%1%2%3Stay alert as to where friendly forces are located.%4 Communicate your location to others when appropriate.%1%2%3Watch and listen.%4 The colors of tracers and the sounds of the weapons being used can help to identify the enemy, but bear in mind that over the course of a mission friendly forces may acquire enemy weapons and thus it becomes less and less accurate as a mission progresses.
Key.Chinese: 學會如何辨識友軍或敵人是一項很重要的技能。一個無法分別友軍或敵人制服與裝備的人，是很有可能危害到整個團隊的安全。遵照以下準則，將可有效的避免誤擊事件的發生。%1%1%2%3保持手指離開板機。%4保持你負責"開火"的手指放在滑鼠中鍵，遠離開火鍵，這有助於避免在最糟糕的時刻產生誤擊事件。%1<imgsize='5'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\mouse_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3仔細思考後再射擊。%4發射前請先確認其單位。如果感覺不對，那就暫時不要開火。假如他看起來像是友軍，有著友軍的武器，而且沒有向你射擊，但其確身處在敵方的區域中，那他可能是友軍，而你不能承擔任何未經確認就開火的後果。%1%2%3請隨時警覺友軍目前的位置。%4在適當的時候與友軍保持聯繫，互相告知位置。%1%2%3眼觀四面，耳聽八方。%4曳光彈的顏色與武器擊發的聲音都有助於辨別敵人，但友軍也有可能在任務的過程中繳獲敵方的武器，所以這樣的辨別方式有時也不是很準確。
Key.Chinesesimp: 学会如何辨识友军或敌人是一项很重要的技能。一个无法分别友军或敌人制服与装备的人，是很有可能危害到整个团队安全的。遵照以下准则，将可有效的避免误击事件的发生。%1%1%2%3保持手指离开板机。%4保持你负责"开火"的手指放在鼠标中键，远离开火键，这有助于避免在最糟糕的时刻产生误击事件。%1<imgsize='5'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\mouse_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3仔细思考后再射击。%4发射前请先确认其单位。如果感觉不对，那就暂时不要开火。假如他看起来像是友军，有着友军的武器，而且没有向你射击，但其身处在敌方的区域中，那他可能是友军，而你不能承担任何未经确认就开火的后果。%1%2%3请随时警戒友军目前的位置。%4在适当的时候与友军保持联系，互相告知位置。%1%2%3眼观四面，耳听八方。%4曳光弹的颜色与武器击发的声音都有助于辨别敌人，但友军也有可能在任务的过程中缴获敌方的武器，所以这样的辨别方式有时也不是很准确。

Key.Original: The most fundamental rules of operating as a guerrilla force are as follows:%1%1%2%3Choose your targets carefully.%4 It’s not wise to conduct an operation in an area where the enemy is vastly superior and able to quickly react to your presence. Choose vulnerable targets, ones which are isolated from supporting forces.%1%2%3Strike hard and fast.%4 Ambushes allow your force to pick a place where the enemy is known to be operating and stack the odds in your favor.%1%2%3Don’t become fixed or allow the enemy to mass power against you.%4 There are many ways to avoid being fixed. The simplest is to deploy your forces throughout an area, and not simply at one point.%1%2%3Work to minimize the power of enemy advantages.%4 Being familiar with the strengths of your enemy is essential, as it gives you the opportunity to plan things to be most heavily in your side’s favor.%1%2%3Exploit the target site (quickly!).%4 Search enemy bodies, vehicles, buildings, etc., to locate key items and quickly distribute them to your fellow guerrillas for transport.%1%2%3Leave presents.%4 Place mines in likely response avenues, within bunkers, at entry points, around enemy KIA, etc.%1%1%2%3Have a plan for withdrawal.%4 A withdrawal plan ideally has multiple routes, allowing for a larger guerrilla force to split into smaller parties on their way out of the area.%1%2%3Be Ever Vigilant.%4 You should never relax or consider yourself to be “safe” – always assume you are being observed.
Key.Chinese: 以下是一些游擊部隊必須遵守的規則:%1%1%2%3仔細選擇你的目標。%4在敵人兵力遠勝於你，或是能快速應變你攻擊的地方執行游擊戰是不明智的。最好選擇脆弱且被孤立的目標。%1%2%3迅速且猛烈的打擊。%4埋伏能使你的隊伍挑選一處對你有利的地方。%1%2%3不要固定在同一地方或是讓敵人有機會組織力量來對付你。%4有很多方法能避免幾方部隊固定在同一個地方。最簡單的方法就是讓你的部隊分散在整個區域，而不是單一個點上。%1%2%3盡量減少敵人的優勢。%4了解你敵人的優勢使很重要的，這使你能事先計劃好應對方案。%1%2%3掃清目標點(要非常快速!)。%4搜尋敵人的屍體，載具，建築物等等。找出關鍵物品並迅速分配給你的隊友帶走它。%1%2%3留下禮物。%4放置地雷在敵人可能會經過的地方，像是掩體內，入口處或是敵人的屍體旁等等地點。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\mine_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3有計劃的撤退。%4一個良好的撤退計畫最好要擁有許多路線，好讓大型的游擊隊可以分散成許多小隊撤出行動區域。%1%2%3隨時保持警覺。%4你永遠不能放鬆或認為自己已經"安全"了，你必須假設敵人還在觀察你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 以下是一些游击部队必须遵守的规则:%1%1%2%3仔细选择你的目标。%4在敌人兵力远胜于你，或是能快速应变你攻击的地方执行游击战是不明智的。最好选择脆弱且被孤立的目标。%1%2%3迅速且猛烈的打击。%4选择埋伏战术并藏在适合偷袭的地方能使你的队伍处于有利的高度。%1%2%3不要固定在同一地方或是让敌人有机会组织力量来对付你。%4有很多方法能避免己方部队固定在同一个地方。最简单的方法就是让你的部队分散在整个区域，而不是单一个点上。%1%2%3尽量减少敌人的优势。%4了解你敌人的优势使很重要的，这使你能事先计划好应对方案。%1%2%3扫清目标点(要非常快速!)。%4搜寻敌人的尸体，载具，建筑物等等。找出关键物品并迅速分配给你的队友带走它。%1%2%3留下礼物。%4放置地雷在敌人可能会经过的地方，像是掩体内，入口处或是敌人的尸体旁等等地点。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\mine_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3有计划的撤退。%4一个良好的撤退计划最好要拥有许多路线，好让大型的游击队可以分散成许多小队撤出行动区域。%1%2%3随时保持警觉。%4你永远不能放松或认为自己已经"安全"了，你必须假设敌人还在观察你。

Key.Original: Basic marksmanship is a skill that we encourage practicing. The process starts with learning how it all works, which we’ll go into now.%1%1%2%3Ballistics.%4 Bullets follow a ballistic arc determined by gravity, air resistance etc. Since the muzzle sits below the sights, the barrel and sights are at slightly different angles, this causes the bullet to cross the “point of aim” (where the sights are pointing) twice. After that, the bullet will start to drop below the point of aim. Knowing where to expect the bullet to be at any point along the trajectory helps you to compensate via “offset aiming” for targets that are at ranges other than what your weapon was zeroed for.%1%1%2%3Sight Usage.%4 The term “sight picture” refers to the way the front sight, crosshair, or reflex dot is oriented relative to the target being engaged. The typical sight picture you want to achieve is that of the center-of-mass hold, which is where the sight rests on the upper chest of the enemy, or the center of their visible mass. This is intended to give you the best possible chance of hitting them.%1%1%2%3Bore Offset.%4 The origin of the bullet will be from the actual weapon muzzle, and not the center of the screen. Keep in mind that your weapon sights are a few inches above the rifle bore. If you do not take this into account, you will occasionally find instances where you’re shooting into the ground (or an obstacle). The crosshair will indicate if something is close to the bore by shifting position backwards to reflect where the bullet will strike (optional).
Key.Chinese: 在基礎槍法中我們認識到了一些影響你射擊的事物。現在讓我們開始了解一些射擊本身的技巧。%1%1%2%3彈道學。%4子彈是由重力與空氣阻力等等來決定彈道的走向。由於槍口在瞄準鏡的下方，所以槍管與瞄準鏡的瞄準角度會有一點不一樣，這帶來的後果就是子彈彈道的最高點會高於"瞄準點"兩倍。再達到最高點後，子彈會開始向下降直到低過瞄準點。如果射擊的目標不再你武器的歸零範圍之內，你可以通過"偏移瞄準"來修正彈道。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\trajectory_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3如何瞄準。%4"瞄準景象"這術語指的是由準心，十字線或是反射點所構成瞄準目標的景象。基本的瞄準景象是將準心放在目標的胸口上方，或是其正中間的位置。這是為了讓你能更好擊中敵人。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\sights_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3偏移瞄準。%4子彈射擊的點是來自槍口，而不是畫面的正中央。請記住，你的瞄準鏡跟槍管是具有幾英吋的差距。假如你不注意這點，你很有可能會打不中目標。如果子彈的落點比較下面，你可以通過提高瞄準點來擊中敵人，反之子彈過高，則是壓低瞄準點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在基础枪法中我们认识到了一些影响你射击的事物。现在让我们开始了解一些射击本身的技巧。%1%1%2%3弹道学。%4子弹是由重力与空气阻力等等来决定弹道的走向。由于枪口在瞄准镜的下方，所以枪管与瞄准镜的瞄准角度会有一点不一样，这带来的后果就是子弹弹道的最高点会高于"瞄准点"两倍。再达到最高点后，子弹会开始向下降直到低过瞄准点。如果射击的目标不再你武器的归零范围之内，你可以通过"偏移瞄准"来修正弹道。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\trajectory_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3如何瞄准。%4"瞄准景象"这术语指的是由准星，十字线或是反射点所构成瞄准目标的景象。基本的瞄准景象是将准星放在目标的胸口上方，或是其正中间的位置。这是为了让你能更好击中敌人。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\sights_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3偏移瞄准。%4子弹射击的点是来自枪口，而不是画面的正中央。请记住，你的瞄准镜跟枪管是具有几英寸的差距。假如你不注意这点，你很有可能会打不中目标。如果子弹的落点比较下面，你可以通过提高瞄准点来击中敌人，反之子弹过高，则是压低瞄准点。

Key.Original: The fireteam is the smallest combat element employed at the platoon level. The Fireteam Leader’s (FTL) mantra is “Follow me and do as I do”.%1%1%1%3Fireteam Leaders ...%4%1%2%3... ensure that their fireteam members maintain good interval and situational awareness.%4 This is accomplished in part by giving simple formations (typically line, wedge, or staggered column) and emphasizing proper sector coverage and security. The FTL must be vigilant and proactive in preventing their team members from becoming target-fixated or bunched up.%1%2%3... control and direct the team’s fire.%4 While the FTL can often let his team members engage at will, there will come times when the direction of their fire is critical to success - engagement of high-priority targets such as snipers, machineguns, and vehicles are good examples.%1%2%3... maintain accountability of their team members.%4 It's up to the FTL to ensure that no team members are left behind. A FTL should do a team check after every engagement, and multiple times during extended fights. Having a team member go down without the FTL knowing about it can be a major issue.%1%2%3... are proficient with their under-barrel grenade launchers (“UGL”).%4 The FTL must be able to use their UGL to carry out a number of tasks, such as firing high-explosive shells at significant enemy positions, screening friendly movement, marking or masking the enemy with smoke shells.
Key.Chinese: 小隊是在整個排級作戰單位中最小的單位。在本單元中，我們將會教你如何當好一個小隊長，而一個好的小隊長其常說的口頭禪便是-"跟隨我，看我做啥就做啥"。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\fireteam2_ca.paa'/>%1%1%3小隊長...%4%1%2%3...時常確保其隊員間的間隔並能清楚了解當下的狀況。%4你可以通過指揮他們排成戰術隊形(像是橫列，縱列或楔形等等)並確保他們合理的分佈在適當的距離上。小隊長必須時常小心與關切其隊員是否同時專注於同一目標或是隊形過於擁擠。%1%2%3...控制開火時機與開火方向。%4小隊長基本上可以讓他的隊員隨時處在自由交戰的狀態，但隨之而來的是，你必須在交戰中優先指名高價值目標-像是狙擊手，機槍手或者載具等等比較高危險性的目標。%1%2%3...時常確認你的小隊員。%4小隊長的其中一項責任，就是確定沒有任何隊友被留在後面。小隊長必須在每次交戰後確認其隊員的安全，或是在長期交戰中多次進行確認。最糟糕的就是當有隊員走失或倒下，但小隊長並不知情，這種狀況是不可取的。%1%2%3...必須精通下掛式榴彈發射器。%4一個好的小隊長通常要在任務中攜帶數枚榴彈，像是使用高爆彈來對付敵人的陣地，也可使用煙霧彈來標記敵人的位置或隱藏自己人的蹤跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小队是在整个排级作战单位中最小的单位。在本单元中，我们将会教你如何当好一个小队长，而一个好的小队长其常说的口头禅便是-"跟随我，看我做啥就做啥"。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\fireteam2_ca.paa'/>%1%1%3小队长...%4%1%2%3...时常确保其队员间的间隔并能清楚了解当下的状况。%4你可以通过指挥他们排成战术队形(像是横列，纵列或楔形等等)并确保他们合理的分布在适当的距离上。小队长必须时常小心与关切其队员是否同时专注于同一目标或是队形过于拥挤。%1%2%3...控制开火时机与开火方向。%4小队长基本上可以让他的队员随时处在自由交战的状态，但随之而来的是，你必须在交战中优先指名高价值目标-像是狙击手，机枪手或者载具等等比较高危险性的目标。%1%2%3...时常确认你的小队员。%4小队长的其中一项责任，就是确定没有任何队友被留在后面。小队长必须在每次交战后确认其队员的安全，或是在长期交战中多次进行确认。最糟糕的就是当有队员走失或倒下，但小队长并不知情，这种状况是不可取的。%1%2%3...必须精通下挂式榴弹发射器。%4一个好的小队长通常要在任务中携带数枚榴弹，像是使用高爆弹来对付敌人的阵地，也可使用烟雾弹来标记敌人的位置或隐藏自己人的踪迹。

Key.Original: Defending can take many forms. An element may be tasked with protecting something important, such as a building, key road or intersection, vehicle, or high-value personnel. It may also simply need to protect itself while in a static position. Whatever the case may be, there are several common themes to defending successfully.%1%1%2%3Security.%4 Security comes in the form of ensuring that the defensive positions can observe all around the defensive location and cover all possible avenues of approach.%1%1%2%3Positioning.%4 Every fighting position should be chosen to minimize exposure to enemy observation and fires, while maximizing the lethality of the soldier fighting from that position.%1%1%2%3Depth.%4 Spreading a defending force thinly over a long frontage, with no reserve and no depth to the defense, is tactically unsound. Defenders must ensure that they have depth to their defense.%1%2%3Mutual support.%4 The ultimate goal is to make it impossible for the enemy to attack one position in isolation - instead, they will always find themselves engaged by a supporting position, forcing them to attempt to attack both positions at the same time, which dilutes their efforts.%1%2%3Flexibility.%4 In an ideal situation, each defensive position has an alternate position to fight from, as well as “fall-back” positions which are deeper in the defended areas.
Key.Chinese: 防守的任務有很多形式。像是保護重要的建築物，交通要道，載具或者重要的人物等等。也有可能只是固守在一個點來保護自己。不管狀況怎樣，有同樣幾件關鍵的重點是關乎防守成功與否。%1%1%2%3安全。%4安全的建立來自於選擇防守的地點，這地點必須能觀察到防守點附近所有的環境以及敵人可能會接近的路線。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\security_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3防守位置。%4每一個單兵的防守位置必須選擇能有效隱蔽自己行蹤與降低敵人擊中你的地方，但同時也能夠最大限度的增加該單兵的殺傷力。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\defending_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3縱深防禦。%4把整個防禦部隊分散在同一正面，將會使防禦陣線沒有縱深且沒有後備部隊，而這是不正確的戰術。防禦者必須確保他的防禦陣線是有縱深。%1%2%3互相支援。%4這個目的在於避免一個點因為敵人的攻擊而被孤立且瓦解-相反的，敵人會發現他們攻擊的是一個強而有力的支撐點，時間久了，自然而然敵方的力量就會慢慢削弱。%1%2%3靈活性。%4一個好的防守，通常每個防守者都還有一個或多個的備用防守點，這用來在"戰術性撤退"時可在建立防禦陣地，這種戰術在防禦一片區域時尤其有效。
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守的任务有很多形式。像是保护重要的建筑物，交通要道，载具或者重要的人物等等。也有可能只是固守在一个点来保护自己。不管状况怎样，有同样几件关键的重点是关乎防守成功与否。%1%1%2%3安全。%4安全的建立来自于选择防守的地点，这地点必须能观察到防守点附近所有的环境以及敌人可能会接近的路线。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\security_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3防守位置。%4每一个单兵的防守位置必须选择能有效隐蔽自己行踪与降低敌人击中你的地方，但同时也能够最大限度的增加该单兵的杀伤力。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\defending_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3纵深防御。%4把整个防御部队分散在同一正面，将会使防御阵线没有纵深且没有后备部队，而这是不正确的战术。防御者必须确保他的防御阵线是有纵深。%1%2%3互相支援。%4这个目的在于避免一个点因为敌人的攻击而被孤立且瓦解-相反的，敌人会发现他们攻击的是一个强而有力的支撑点，时间久了，自然而然敌方的力量就会慢慢削弱。%1%2%3灵活性。%4一个好的防守，通常每个防守者都还有一个或多个的备用防守点，这用来在"战术性撤退"时可在建立防御阵地，这种战术在防御一片区域时尤其有效。

Key.Original: The first rule of “not being shot” is ensuring that the enemy either cannot see you or cannot hit you, or both. Here are some useful tips for covering and concealing yourself:%1%1%2%3Cover first.%4 You should strive to be always in cover or concealment when combat is occurring. If the enemy cannot visually locate you, they will not be able to accurately shoot at you. Even if they do know where you are, hard cover can prevent them from effectively engaging you.%1%1%2%3Sight Displacement.%4 One critical thing to remember in Arma 3 is that the view you get from iron sight mode is offset down and to the right of your normal view. If you take this into consideration when utilizing cover, you can expose much less of your body.%1%2%3Urban Prone.%4 The lowest stance adjust can allow you to more easily see or fire under a vehicle you’re taking cover behind. While you won’t be able to use your sights easily in this stance, it works very well for putting fire on close enemies in an unexpected fashion.%1%2%3Buddy Cover.%4 If your team has been chewed apart by an ambush and you can’t possibly run for cover without getting mowed down, try hunkering down behind a dead body and using it as cover while you return fire on the enemy.%1
Key.Chinese: 要達成"不被擊中"不外乎有兩項條件，一是敵人看不到你，再來是射不到你，兩者兼具則更佳。以下是一些教你如何尋找掩護與隱蔽的有用提示:%1%1%2%3掩護為第一要務。%4你必須時常在交戰中掩護或隱蔽自己。假使敵人無法有效的看見你，自然他們也不會射中你。即使他們知道你在哪，堅固的掩體總是能有效的幫你抵擋住他們的攻擊。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\conceal_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3位移瞄準。%4在武裝突襲3中，你只要槍管不被障礙擋到，就可以透過你的瞄準鏡來瞄準敵人。所以你可以透過左傾右傾來露出一點點的身體，使被命中的機率大為降低。%1%2%3側身臥射。%4低矮的姿態能使你輕易的從載具底下的隙縫觀察或開火。儘管在這個姿勢中你將變得不好瞄準，但這可以對極近的敵人達成意想不到的驚喜。%1%2%3屍體掩護。%4假使你們遭遇意想不到的攻擊並深陷泥沼，附近沒有任何有效的掩體時，你也可以利用地上的屍體當作臨時的掩護。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\buddy_ca.paa'/>
Key.Chinesesimp: 要达成"不被击中"不外乎有两项条件，一是敌人看不到你，再来是射不到你，两者兼具则更佳。以下是一些教你如何寻找掩护与隐蔽的有用提示:%1%1%2%3掩护为第一要务。%4你必须时常在交战中掩护或隐蔽自己。假使敌人无法有效的看见你，自然他们也不会射中你。即使他们知道你在哪，坚固的掩体总是能有效的帮你抵挡住他们的攻击。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\conceal_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3位移瞄准。%4在武装突袭3中，你只要枪管不被障碍挡到，就可以透过你的瞄准镜来瞄准敌人。所以你可以透过左倾右倾来露出一点点的身体，使被命中的机率大为降低。%1%2%3侧身卧射。%4低矮的姿态能使你轻易的从载具底下的隙缝观察或开火。尽管在这个姿势中你将变得不好瞄准，但这可以对极近的敌人达成意想不到的惊喜。%1%2%3尸体掩护。%4假使你们遭遇意想不到的攻击并深陷泥沼，附近没有任何有效的掩体时，你也可以利用地上的尸体当作临时的掩护。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\buddy_ca.paa'/>

Key.Original: If your element comes under fire, follow these basic guidelines, depending on what level of leadership you’re at.%1%1%3Fireteam Leader%4%1%2%3Ensure that your fireteam has positioned itself appropriately.%4 If not, order them to a covered or concealed position. If necessary due to bad positioning, deploy smoke and pull your team back to better cover or concealment.%1%1%2%3Determine the location of the enemy as precisely as possible.%4 Begin engaging the enemy yourself. Use your under-barrel grenade launcher against clusters of the enemy and high-value targets and use the rifle against individual soldiers. Stay tactically alert and avoid getting tunnel vision.%1%2%3Direct the fire of your team as needed.%4 This includes massing fire on specific targets or covering a very specific sector.%1%2%3Be prepared to maneuver.%4 Scan the area and consider how and where you might move to gain a tactical advantage over the enemy.
Key.Chinese: 假如你的單位遭遇襲擊，請遵照以下準則行動，準則將會因你的角色不同而有所改變。%1%1%3小隊長%4%1%2%3確認你的小隊是否處在一個適當的位置。%4假如不是，下令他們尋找掩護或是隱藏點。而如果你們正處於一個壞地點上的話，請使用煙霧彈來掩護你們向後撤，並尋找更好的掩護或是隱藏點。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3盡可能準確的定位敵人的位置。%4開始與敵人交戰。使用下掛式榴彈發射器對付群集的敵人或高價值目標，並使用步槍對付個別的散兵。隨時保持緊戒，以避免所有人都專注在同一個目標上而忽略了其他方向上的敵人。%1%2%3假如有需要，你可以指揮隊伍向一個方向射擊。%4這包括集火特殊目標或是壓制特定區域。%1%2%3隨時保持機動。%4搜索區域並考慮哪個地方可以獲得比敵人更多戰術上的優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你的单位遭遇袭击，请遵照以下准则行动，准则将会因你的角色不同而有所改变。%1%1%3小队长%4%1%2%3确认你的小队是否处在一个适当的位置。%4假如不是，下令他们寻找掩护或是隐藏点。而如果你们正处于一个坏地点上的话，请使用烟雾弹来掩护你们向后撤，并寻找更好的掩护或是隐藏点。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover_ca.paa'/>%1%2%3尽可能准确的定位敌人的位置。%4开始与敌人交战。使用下挂式榴弹发射器对付群集的敌人或高价值目标，并使用步枪对付个别的散兵。随时保持警戒，以避免所有人都专注在同一个目标上而忽略了其他方向上的敌人。%1%2%3假如有需要，你可以指挥队伍向一个方向射击。%4这包括集火特殊目标或是压制特定区域。%1%2%3随时保持机动。%4搜索区域并考虑哪个地方可以获得比敌人更多战术上的优势。

Key.Original: One of the most fundamental combat survival skills is that of situational awareness. This simply means that you are alert to your surrounding environment and can leverage your knowledge of the battlefield’s state to make tactical decisions and judgment calls. Basic Situational Awareness Guidelines:%1%1%2%3Scan for the enemy.%4 Whether you’re moving or halted, you should always be scanning for the enemy. Murphy’s Laws of Combat tell you that the moment you let your guard down and stop scanning is the moment the enemy will appear.%1%2%3Cover assigned areas.%4 Additionally, you should cover whatever area seems to need coverage. Adapt to the situation as needed, and be able to pick out areas that may be more dangerous, and warrant more observation, than others.%1 (Covering sectors in the urban environment) %1%1%2%3Stay alert!%4 There is no “safe” time in a combat zone. If you let your guard down, either you will die from it, or, worse, you will get a teammate killed because of it.%1 (Covering sectors in more open terrain) %1%1%2%3Be aware of “tunnel vision”.%4 Don't get fixated on a specific target, object, or area. Remember that for every enemy you see, there are probably others that you do not. Fixating on a single enemy at the expense of everything else is likely to get you flanked and killed.%1%2%3Check the map frequently.%4 Maintain awareness of friendly positions, suspected enemy locations, and more. The map can be used to mark enemy contacts as well as friendly positions.
Key.Chinese: 情境察覺是生存技巧中不可或缺的一項最重要的技能。這不只是指單純的對週遭環境的警戒，同時也指能將所學的知識正確地在戰場中發揮出來，來得到戰術優勢。以下是基礎情境察覺的準則:%1%1%2%3搜索敵人。%4不管你是在移動或停止，你都應當時時注意敵人的行蹤。戰鬥的墨菲定律告訴了我們，每當你放鬆警惕的時刻，往往就是敵人會出現的時機。%1%2%3掩護被指派的區域。%4你必須盡你所能的掩護被指派的區域。同時也要對那些看起來比較危險的地方多留意上幾分，確保防守的範圍面面俱到。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover1_ca.paa'/><t%10>(在城市的環境中進行掩護)</t>%1%1%2%3保持警戒!%4在戰區是沒有一處可以稱得上"安全"的地方。假如你放鬆了，你可能將付出死的代價，更慘的是隊友可能因你的疏忽而蒙受損失。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover2_ca.paa'/><t%10>(在更開闊的環境中進行掩護)</t>%1%1%2%3小心"隧道視野"。%4不要太專注於特殊的目標或區域。請記住，每當你看到一個敵人，你就必須假設其他你沒看到的地方還有別的敵人。太專注於一個目標將可能被兩側包夾，而慘遭滅團的結果。%1%2%3時常檢視地圖。%4時常確認友軍與敵人的位置。如果可以，最好在地圖上標記出敵人與友軍的現在位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 情境察觉是生存技巧中不可或缺的一项最重要的技能。这不只是指单纯的对周遭环境的警戒，同时也指能将所学的知识正确地在战场中发挥出来，来得到战术优势。以下是基础情境察觉的准则:%1%1%2%3搜索敌人。%4不管你是在移动或停止，你都应当时时注意敌人的行踪。战斗的墨菲定律告诉我们，每当你放松警惕的时刻，往往就是敌人会出现的时机。%1%2%3掩护被指派的区域。%4你必须尽你所能的掩护被指派的区域。同时也要对那些看起来比较危险的地方多留意上几分，确保防守的范围面面俱到。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover1_ca.paa'/><t%10>(在城市的环境中进行掩护)</t>%1%1%2%3保持警戒!%4在战区是没有一处可以称得上"安全"的地方。假如你放松了，你可能将付出阵亡的代价，更恐怖的是队友可能因你的疏忽而蒙受损失。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\cover2_ca.paa'/><t%10>(在更开阔的环境中进行掩护)</t>%1%1%2%3小心"隧道视野"。%4不要太专注于特殊的目标或区域。请记住，每当你看到一个敌人，你就必须假设其他你没看到的地方还有别的敌人。太专注于一个目标将可能被两侧包夹，而惨遭覆灭的结果。%1%2%3时常检视地图。%4时常确认友军与敌人的位置。如果可以，最好在地图上标记出敌人与友军的现在位置。

Key.Original: Attacks have three elements to them when employed at the platoon level or higher - the assault, support, and security elements - while a squad attack only has assault and support elements. Let’s take a look at what the responsibilities of each are in further detail.%1%1%2%3Assault Element.%4 The assault element attacks with speed and intensity and avoids getting bogged down. The assault element cannot afford to get stuck out in the open and must be prepared to leave their wounded and dead where they fall and let follow-on forces tend to them, in order to maintain the momentum of their attack.%1%2%3Support Element.%4 The key thing for the support element is that it must have the ability to provide a high volume of fire. This is often more dependent on the weapons that it employs, versus the number of personnel in it. Placing extra machineguns in the support element helps to facilitate this volume.%1%2%3Security Element.%4 A security element provides local security for forces during a platoon-level or higher assault. This typically means that they are focused on preventing exterior enemy forces from disrupting the conduct of the assault on an enemy position. The security element is the first line of observation for and defense against any spoiling attacks the enemy may attempt. Security elements can also be merged in with the support element as part of the base of fire.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊將因你的部隊大小而有所不同，排級的作戰力量可以區分成突擊，支援，安保等等單位，而小隊的話可以做到突擊與支援。讓我們來看看這些單位的任務內容各自為何%1%1%2%3突擊單位。%4突擊單位必須快狠準，並且避免與敵人周旋過久。突擊單位的攻勢不能停下，並且要隨時做好心理準備，把受傷或陣亡的戰友留在原地並繼續推進，把他們留給後續部隊照顧，藉此維持攻擊的力量。%1%2%3支援單位。%4支援單位要做到的一項最重要的事情，就是必須確保能提供大量的火力。所以通常支援單位都交由有著大型或火力強大的機槍手等等職位來擔當。機槍能確保大量且長時間的火力掩蓋。%1%2%3安保單位。%4安保單位只會在排級或更高級別的戰鬥中出現。安保單位負責確保其他單位在進行任務時，不會有額外的敵人來干擾行動區域內的任務。安保單位必須觀察並防守敵人的一切反攻。他們也可以跟支援單位合併，一起進行擔當基礎火力的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击将因你的部队大小而有所不同，排级的作战力量可以区分成突击，支援，安保等等单位，而小队的话可以做到突击与支援。让我们来看看这些单位的任务内容各自为何%1%1%2%3突击单位。%4突击单位必须快狠准，并且避免与敌人周旋过久。突击单位的攻势不能停下，并且要随时做好心理准备，把受伤或阵亡的战友留在原地并继续推进，把他们留给后续部队照顾，藉此维持攻击的力量。%1%2%3支援单位。%4支援单位要做到的一项最重要的事情，就是必须确保能提供大量的火力。所以通常支援单位都交由有着大型或火力强大的机枪手等等职位来担当。机枪能确保大量且长时间的火力掩盖。%1%2%3安保单位。%4安保单位只会在排级或更高级别的战斗中出现。安保单位负责确保其他单位在进行任务时，不会有额外的敌人来干扰行动区域内的任务。安保单位必须观察并防守敌人的一切反攻。他们也可以跟支援单位合并，一起进行担当基础火力的任务。

Key.Original: Ambushes are an extremely favorable way to engage the enemy. The combination of surprise and fierce, accurate fire can rip an enemy element to pieces before they have time to react.%1%1%3Key Elements of an Ambush%4%1%2%3Friendly Positioning.%4 The best ambushes have the friendly forces located in good cover and concealment, firing from an elevated position. This makes it the most difficult for the ambushed enemy to be able to effectively retaliate.%1 (Linear ambush) %1%1%2%3Location of the Kill Zone.%4 The kill zone is the area in which fire is focused at the initiation of the ambush. An ideal kill zone has very little cover or concealment, and no significant terrain features that might cause “dead zones” to exist. A kill zone should be well-covered by friendly lines of fire, and any potential exits from it should be able to be fired at/into without friendly forces shifting positions.%1 (L-shaped ambush) %1%1%2%3Proper Initiation of Fires.%4 The signal to start the ambush is usually given by the element leader. Once the order is given, all friendlies should begin firing a heavy and accurate volume of fire into the kill zone. Continue firing until all enemies are confirmed dead or the element leader gives a command to shift or cease fire. If a friendly accidentally fires before the element leader, the ambush is initiated whether it should have been or not.%1%2%3Using explosives.%4 You must also consider the use of explosives devices like satchel charges and claymore mines. These are usually not practical for a hasty ambush, but a vehicle ambush or deliberate ambush can benefit greatly from their usage.
Key.Chinese: 伏擊是種對敵人極為有效的一種打擊方式。一個良好的伏擊，必須具備驚嚇，猛烈，準確等等要素來在敵人來得及反應之前摧毀他們。%1%1%3伏擊的關鍵要素%4%1%2%3友軍位置。%4通常位置最建議挑選掩護與隱蔽性都良好的地點，最好還是高處，這可使被伏擊的敵人難以回擊你們的攻擊。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\ambush1_ca.paa'/><t%10>(直線伏擊)</t>%1%1%2%3尋找殺戮地帶。%4殺戮地帶指的是埋伏區中最被容易集火的位置。最好選擇那些沒有掩護與隱蔽的平淡地形來當作"死亡禁區"。殺戮地帶最好能全面的被所有埋伏部隊瞄準且射擊，且區域的入口與出口也都可以照顧到。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\ambush2_ca.paa'/><t%10>(L形埋伏)</t>%1%1%2%3於正確的時機開火。%4攻擊的時機通常交由小隊長來下達。一旦命令下達，所有單位必須傾盡所有火力射向殺戮地帶。持續開火直到敵人都確認陣亡，或是小隊長下令停火為止。假如在下令開火前有人不小心走火了，那就不管命令直接開火，不必等待命令了。%1%2%3使用炸藥。%4你也可以考慮使用炸藥包或地雷等等炸藥。這通常不適合臨時的伏擊行動，但如果是有事先良好的規劃，這將可對敵人的車隊造成最大限度的傷亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击是种对敌人极为有效的一种打击方式。一个良好的伏击，必须具备惊吓，猛烈，准确等等要素来在敌人来得及反应之前摧毁他们。%1%1%3伏击的关键要素%4%1%2%3友军位置。%4通常位置最建议挑选掩护与隐蔽性都良好的地点，最好还是高处，这可使被伏击的敌人难以回击你们的攻击。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\ambush1_ca.paa'/><t%10>(直线伏击)</t>%1%1%2%3寻找杀戮地带。%4杀戮地带指的是埋伏区中最被容易集火的位置。最好选择那些没有掩护与隐蔽的平淡地形来当作"死亡禁区"。杀戮地带最好能全面的被所有埋伏部队瞄准且射击，且区域的入口与出口也都可以照顾到。%1<imgsize='9'shadow='0'image='A3\Ui_f\data\GUI\Cfg\Hints\TGuide\ambush2_ca.paa'/><t%10>(L形埋伏)</t>%1%1%2%3于正确的时机开火。%4攻击的时机通常交由小队长来下达。一旦命令下达，所有单位必须倾尽所有火力射向杀戮地带。持续开火直到敌人都确认阵亡，或是小队长下令停火为止。假如在下令开火前有人不小心走火了，那就不管命令直接开火，不必等待命令了。%1%2%3使用炸药。%4你也可以考虑使用炸药包或地雷等等炸药。这通常不适合临时的伏击行动，但如果是有事先良好的规划，这将对敌人的车队造成巨大的伤亡。

Key.Original: Instructor figure represents the military insight available to help you carry out your tasks.%1%2To prompt the advice, press %3[0]%4, %3[8]%4.
Key.Chinese: 教官提醒通常會給你一些任務上有用的提示。%1%2要觀看教官提醒，請按%3[0]%4，%3[8]%4來查看。
Key.Chinesesimp: 教官提醒通常会给你一些任务上有用的提示。%1%2要观看教官提醒，请按%3[0]%4，%3[8]%4来查看。

Key.Original: Log of the instructor's advices can be found in the Diary, section Instructor Figure.%1%2 Open the diary with %11.
Key.Chinese: 教官講過的話也可以在日誌中找到。%1%2使用%11來打開日誌。
Key.Chinesesimp: 教官讲过的话也可以在日志中找到。%1%2使用%11来打开日志。

Key.Original: Mil dots serve as a reliable helper to acquiring the target distance. The distance between dots represents one milliradian. How to use it:%1%2Know your target size.%1%2Measure your current target height in mils.%1%2Calcualte the distance:%1Distance = Target size * 1000 / Mils read
Key.Chinese: 密位點是來幫助射手了解目標與自己的距離。點與點間的距離是1密位。要如何使用:%1%2知道你的目標大小。%1%2測量你的目標有多高。%1%2計算距離:%1距離=目標高度*1000/密位
Key.Chinesesimp: 密位点是来帮助射手了解目标与自己的距离。点与点间的距离是1密位。要如何使用:%1%2知道你的目标大小。%1%2测量你的目标有多高。%1%2计算距离:%1距离=目标高度*1000/密位

Key.Original: A sharp ear is often as valuable as a sharp eye, and there are several things you will want to listen for at all times, such as the sounds of combat, vehicles, movement, and voices.%1%1%2%3Combat.%4 If you hear firing, figure out what direction it’s coming from. The more experienced you are, the more likely you’ll be able to distinguish the different types of rifle fire from a distance.%1%2%3Vehicles.%4 Being able to hear a vehicle from a distance, as well as to identify the class by the sound it makes (such as being able to distinguish the noise of tracks from wheels, or rotors from jet engines) can help to prevent surprise and maintain the initiative.%1%2%3Movement.%4 Soldiers make noise as they move around the battlefield, so listen for it. Observe the sound of boots on gravel, uniforms brushing against trees, the thumping and rustling of someone running through underbrush, or anything else that catches the ear. This is particularly important in dense terrain.%1%2%3Voices.%4 Know who your teammates are, and know their voices. If you hear someone you don’t recognize, it could quite possibly be the enemy. If you know you’re in enemy territory, stay particularly alert for any unknown voices, and use any that you hear to help guide you towards the enemy and deal some damage to them.
Key.Chinese: 一個耳聽八方的耳朵，其帶來的效果不比眼睛觀察差，你必須時常注意戰鬥，載具，移動，講話聲音等等。%1%1%2%3戰鬥。%4假如你聽到槍聲，請先搞清楚大致方向在哪。如果你經驗豐富，你甚至可以辨別開火的槍枝是哪一種類型。%1%2%3載具。%4從遠處辨別載具的聲音，如螺旋槳，噴射引擎或車輪的聲音，藉此提早戒備並維持主動權。%1%2%3移動。%4士兵在移動的時候，多多少少都會發出一點聲音，所以請仔細留意它們。敵人的皮靴經常有可能會在碎石，樹木，草叢間發出聲音。留意它們將使你的生存率提高。%1%2%3講話聲音。%4了解你的隊友，謹記他們的聲音。假如你聽到了你不認識的聲音，它就有可能是由敵人所發出的。假如你好好應用以上幾招，你將能在敵人的領土上獲得先機，給敵人一個驚喜並重創他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一对耳听八方的耳朵，其带来的效果不比眼睛观察差，你必须时常注意战斗，载具，移动，讲话声音等等。%1%1%2%3战斗。%4假如你听到枪声，请先搞清楚大致方向在哪。如果你经验丰富，你甚至可以辨别开火的枪支是哪一种类型。%1%2%3载具。%4从远处辨别载具的声音，如螺旋桨，喷射引擎或车轮的声音，藉此提早戒备并维持主动权。%1%2%3移动。%4士兵在移动的时候，多多少少都会发出一点声音，所以请仔细留意它们。敌人的皮靴经常有可能会在碎石，树木，草丛间发出声音。留意它们将使你的生存率提高。%1%2%3讲话声音。%4了解你的队友，谨记他们的声音。假如你听到了你不认识的声音，它就有可能是由敌人所发出的。假如你好好应用以上几招，你将能在敌人的领土上获得先机，给敌人一个惊喜并重创他们。

Key.Original: many supporting static items and objects are available to use in the editor: signs of evacuations, survival equipment and more
Key.Chinese: 更多的支援物件可以在編輯器裡使用了:逃生標記，生存裝備等等
Key.Chinesesimp: 更多的支援物件可以在编辑器里使用了:逃生标记，生存装备等等

Key.Original: infra-red throwable objects for every faction, used to mark locations
Key.Chinese: 每個陣營皆可使用紅外線手榴彈，使用它來標記目標或位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个阵营皆可使用红外手榴弹，使用它来标记目标或位置

Key.Chinese: 新的長距離狙擊用瞄準鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: 新型长距离狙击瞄准镜

Key.Original: maneuverable air transport and fire support for the AAF
Key.Chinese: 機動空中運輸與火力支援型的AAF直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 机动空中运输与火力支援型的AAF直升机

Key.Original: the AAF's versatile Infantry Fighting Vehicle
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的多功能步兵戰車

Key.Original: fully new Main Battle Tank for the AAF
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的全新主戰坦克

Key.Original: Alongside the next campaign episode, we've added some significant content for everyone:
Key.Chinese: 除了新章節，我們還為大家準備了許多新的豐富內容:
Key.Chinesesimp: 除了新章节，我们还为大家准备了许多新的丰富内容:

Key.Original: After suffering heavy losses, a small group of survivors made it off the island, though their fate remains <t color='%1'>unknown</t>.
Key.Chinese: 在遭遇種種損失後，剩下的一小搓倖存者們逃離了島嶼，儘管他們的命運仍是<tcolor='%1'>未知數</t>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在遭遇重大损失后，剩下的一小撮幸存者们逃离了岛屿，尽管他们的命运仍是<tcolor='%1'>未知数</t>。

Key.Original: The AAF were heavily reinforced by <t color='%1'>CSAT</t> forces. Captain Miller ordered a <t color='%1'>full retreat</t>, claiming NATO reinforcements were no longer inbound.
Key.Chinese: 但阿爾蒂斯武裝力量卻叫了<tcolor='%1'>廣協同盟部隊</t>來支援他們，他們的實力因此大大的增強。所以上校米勒下令<tcolor='%1'>全面撤退</t>，並宣稱北約援軍不會過來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF被<tcolor='%1'>广协部队</t>大幅加强。所以米勒上校下令<tcolor='%1'>全面撤退</t>，并宣称北约援军不会来了。

Key.Original: Captain Miller and his team managed to <t color='%1'>reestablish communications</t> with <t color='%1'>NATO MEDCOM</t>. As a last-ditch effort, the survivors launched an attack against the <t color='%1'>capital</t>, hoping to clear a path for inbound reinforcements.
Key.Chinese: 在那晚，上校米勒和他的隊伍終於與<tcolor='%1'>北約地中海通信系統</t>重建<tcolor='%1'>通訊</t>。作為最後一搏，倖存者們對<tcolor='%1'>首都</t>發動了攻擊，希望為將要抵達的援軍清出一條路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在那晚，米勒上校和他的队伍终于与<tcolor='%1'>北约地中海司令部</t>重建<tcolor='%1'>联络</t>。作为最后一搏，幸存者们对<tcolor='%1'>首府</t>发动了攻击，希望为将要抵达的援军清出一条路。

Key.Original: AAF forces quickly located Camp Maxwell and launched an attack in the dead of night. Though the attack was defeated, the survivors suffered <t color='%1'>heavy losses</t>.
Key.Chinese: 但是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊還是快速的找到了麥克斯韋營地，並在一個深夜中發動突襲。儘管擊退了此次攻擊，倖存者們卻承受了<tcolor='%1'>巨大的損失</t>。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF部队很快发现了麦克斯韦营地，并在深夜中发动突袭。尽管击退了此次攻击，幸存者们却付出了<tcolor='%1'>巨大的损失</t>。

Key.Original: Attempts to coordinate a series of hit-and-run attacks against key AAF installations, under the command of <t color='%1'>Captain Miller (British Special Forces)</t>, were met with limited success.
Key.Chinese: 在<tcolor='%1'>上校米勒(英國特種部隊)</t>的指揮下，執行了一系列的游擊任務來對抗阿爾蒂斯武裝力量，並獲得了有限的成功。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在<tcolor='%1'>米勒上校(英国特种部队)</t>的指挥下，实施了一系列的游击作战对抗AAF，并获得了有限的成功。

Key.Original: A small group of survivors regrouped at <t color='%1'>Camp Maxwell</t>, a former NATO outpost that had already been <t color='%1'>decommissioned</t>.
Key.Chinese: 所有的倖存者再次集結於<tcolor='%1'>麥克斯韋營地</t>，這營地是一處已經被北約部隊<tcolor='%1'>廢棄多時</t>的營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有的幸存者再次集结于<tcolor='%1'>麦克斯韦营地</t>，这是一处已经被北约部队<tcolor='%1'>废弃多时</t>的哨所。

Key.Original: All local NATO command elements <t color='%1'>fell</t> during the initial attack, <t color='%1'>severing communications</t> with the outside world.
Key.Chinese: 而島上的北約指揮階級皆在初次打擊中<tcolor='%1'>損失</t>，與外界的<tcolor='%1'>通訊</t>也被切斷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而岛上的北约指挥分队皆在初次打击中<tcolor='%1'>损失殆尽</t>，与外界的<tcolor='%1'>通信</t>也被切断。

Key.Original: The remnants of <t color='%1'>NATO</t> forces on <t color='%1'>Stratis</t> were engaged by the <t color='%1'>AAF</t>.
Key.Chinese: 在<tcolor='%1'>斯特拉蒂斯</t>島上剩餘的<tcolor='%1'>北約</t>部隊突然被<tcolor='%1'>阿爾蒂斯武裝力量</t>攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在<tcolor='%1'>斯特拉蒂斯</t>岛上剩余的<tcolor='%1'>北约</t>部队突然被<tcolor='%1'>AAF</t>攻击。

Key.Original: Click the button below to refresh your knowledge of the events during 'Survive'.
Key.Chinese: 點擊下面的按鈕來幫助你複習'生存'章節中發生的所有事件。
Key.Chinesesimp: 点击下面的按钮来帮助你复习'生存'章节中发生的所有事件。

Key.Original: do you prefer to play the whole story in one go, then we recommend waiting for the final episode.
Key.Chinese: 你想要一次玩完整個劇情嗎?那就請你在稍等最後一個章節的上市。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想要一次玩完整个剧情吗?那就请你在稍等最后一个章节的上市。

Key.Original: don't mind waiting for the final episode, then by all means enjoy 'Survive' and 'Adapt' right now!
Key.Chinese: 不想要等待最後一個章節了嗎?那就現在開始玩'生存'與'適應'吧!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不想再等待最后一个章节了吗?那就现在开始玩'生存'与'适应'吧!

Key.Original: Glad to see you return for our second campaign episode: <t color='%1'>'Adapt'</t>. Read on for a description of the campaign, a story recap, and to see other additions to the Arma 3%2 platform.
Key.Chinese: 真高興再次見到你來體驗我們新的章節:<tcolor='%1'>'適應'</t>。閱讀以下訊息來看看戰役的一切故事重點，以及其他我們為武裝突襲3%2新增的內容。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴再次见到你来体验我们新的章节:<tcolor='%1'>'适应'</t>。阅读以下信息来看看战役的一切故事重点，以及其他我们为武装突袭3%2新增的内容。

Key.Original: Creates posters and leafets on walls of buildings. Those buildings are made indestructible.
Key.Chinese: 創建抗議標語與傳單到建築物的牆壁上。這些建築物必須是堅不可摧的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 创建抗议标语与传单到建筑物的墙壁上。这些建筑物必须是坚不可摧的。

Key.Original: Radius of area affected by the module (affects only buildings).
Key.Chinese: 此模塊影響周邊範圍的半徑(只對建築物有效)。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此模块影响周边范围的半径(只对建筑物有效)。

Key.Original: Classes of buildings to be affected by the module. When left empy, all classes are included.
Key.Chinese: 此模塊可以影響的建築物類型。如果為空，則影響所有建築物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此模块可以影响的建筑物类型。如果为空，则影响所有建筑物。

Key.Original: Quantity of leaflets and posters in given area. Value can be 0-1 (1 for maximal density).
Key.Chinese: 設定抗議標語與傳單在範圍內的密度。數值為0-1之間(1為最大值)。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设定抗议标语与传单在范围内的密度。数值为0-1之间(1为最大值)。

Key.Original: Maximal rotation of poster. Rotation is set randomly in given borders.
Key.Chinese: 設定抗議標語最大可以旋轉的角度。角度將在設定的範圍內隨機選擇角度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设定抗议标语最大可以旋转的角度。角度将在设定的范围内随机选择角度。
